Interface IdStore

public interface IdStore

Used for storing the static idAssigner variables from the Meeting and Contact classes so that the ID values are not lost when the program is closed. Loss of these values would compromise ID uniqueness, as the static variables would be 0 upon re-opening the ContactManager program and duplicate IDs would be assigned to new Meetings and Contacts.

Method Summary
 int getContactIdAssigner()
          Used to retrieve the saved value of the Contact idAssigner when Contact data is loaded from a file.
 int getMeetingIdAssigner()
          Used to retrieve the saved value of the Meeting idAssigner when Meeting data is loaded from a file.
 void saveContactIdAssigner(int idAssignerValue)
          Used to save the value of the static idAssigner from the Contact class.
 void saveMeetingIdAssigner(int idAssignerValue)
          Used to save the value of the static idAssigner from the Meeting class.
 

Method Detail

saveContactIdAssigner

void saveContactIdAssigner(int idAssignerValue)
Used to save the value of the static idAssigner from the Contact class. Should be used immediately prior to saving Contact data to file.

Parameters:
idAssignerValue - the value of idAssigner from Contact

saveMeetingIdAssigner

void saveMeetingIdAssigner(int idAssignerValue)
Used to save the value of the static idAssigner from the Meeting class. Should be used immediately prior to saving Meeting data to file.

Parameters:
idAssignerValue - the value of idAssigner from Meeting

getContactIdAssigner

int getContactIdAssigner()
Used to retrieve the saved value of the Contact idAssigner when Contact data is loaded from a file.

Returns:
the value of the Contact idAssigner saved previously.

getMeetingIdAssigner

int getMeetingIdAssigner()
Used to retrieve the saved value of the Meeting idAssigner when Meeting data is loaded from a file.

Returns:
the value of the Meeting idAssigner saved previously.
